segments.text: Looking at this kitchen, I can't help but worry about what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just drying dishes, unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is flooding from the sink, soaking the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If she slips in that puddle, she could really hurt herself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kids are up to no good on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so high, one wrong move and he'll fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little sister is waiting eagerly, but the whole thing is risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if the stool tips and he lands in the water?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting ruined from the overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone turns off that faucet before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a nice garden, but inside it's a hazard zone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears for everyone involved.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking to watch without being able to warn them.
segments.speaker: PAR
